name: Millennium InfoLogic
tag_list: it, ites, software-development, graphics-design, business-processing, production-support, remote-monitoring, market-research, accounting-services, infopark, cochin, kerala, india
overview:
Millennium InfoLogic (MIL) is an India based IT, ITES and consultancy firm, offering a plethora of services to clients worldwide.

Mission —— MIL imbibes a rigor into its work culture which centers on three principals. • Understanding customers needs. • Structured business process to ensure operational effectiveness • Focused and quality assured solutions to attain customer Satisfaction

Description ———- Millennium infoLogic started it’s operations in 2009 as an offshore destination for streamlined order fulfillment services, mainly catering to M/s Millennium Mats, one of the largest manufacturers of Mats and Rugs in the world. Notwithstanding global slowdown and the inclement economic climate MIL has not slacked off from the growth path. From a single vertical in 2009, MIL rapidly expanded their core areas of business to 7 verticals, each an independent service by itself.

• Production Support (www.getmpower.net) • Software Development • Graphics Design & Development • Business Processing • Market Research • Remote desktop support • Accounting Services
